overview: Three years since Korean society was first rocked by the MeToo movement, how much has changed? As the title suggests, #AfterMeToo tackles the activism and resistance that remained after the initial Me Too fever cooled. This anthology documentary ties together four shorts, dealing with the ‘School Me Too’ movement amongst teenagers, the fallout of the Me Too movement in the art world,  confessions surrounding sexual trauma from long ago and its respective healing process, and the sexual self-determination of women.
title: #Aftermetoo
